### Weather
- High Temperature (°F): 85
- Low Temperature (°F): 66
- Precipitation (in): 0.0
- Wind Speed (mph): 7
- Conditions: Sunny

### Field Notes
- Turbidity 45 NTU at WQ-04, 32 NTU at WQ-05
- Nitrate 8.2 mg/L at WQ-04, phosphate 0.9 mg/L
- Agricultural drainage ditch flowing at capacity into tributary above WQ-04

### Compliance Flags
- No compliance flags noted.

### Events
- WQ-01 solar panel cleaned, charging restored to 100%
- Fish kill report investigated near WQ-04: no pathology found, heat stress suspected
- Streamflow at USGS gauge 14.2 cfs

### Notes
- Day 15 monitoring. Agricultural runoff event affecting WQ-04/05 turbidity. Cr at WQ-03: 15 µg/L.

### Sediment Analysis
- Total Organic Carbon (%): 2.1
- Grain Size D50 (mm): 0.55
- Benthic Macroinvertebrate Index: 7.1
